resources.string:
The maximum number of active addresses is 10 and you have reached the limit.

You can have as many archived addresses as you like, and you can always activate an archived address.

To add another address please archive one of your existing addresses.

You are about to add a Bitcoin address or private key to your wallet.

• If you add a Bitcoin address you will be able to monitor its balance, but not spend from it.

• If you add a private key you will get a Bitcoin address that you can spend from.
This address is already part of your wallet.\n\nYou cannot add it to your address book.
The Bitcoin address was already monitored
The address book has another address with that name
You cannot add a private key to the address book.\n\nYou can import private keys in the Keys tab
The amount you are sending is too small

NFSound (Near Field Sound) is a simple app that allows 2+ phones to exchange data over sound

Press"Receive" button to get data

Type anything in the inputbox and press "Send" button to send data

This address does not have a label

%1$s

It is recommended to set a label for all your addresses.

Would you like to set the label?

Jan Møller\nAndreas Petersson\nMegion Research & Development GmbH

Anyone who gains access to those keys can take possession of your Bitcoins.

Import Bitcoin address or private key from clipboard.

You are about to spend from a private key in cold storage. This could be a private key paper backup or a private key slip from a Bitcoin ATM. Several formats are supported.\n\nOnce the transaction has been sent every trace of the private key will be erased from memory.
This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.

A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.

Mycelium is a great wallet and you can use it for free.

Please help our development effort by giving a donation.

Any amount counts!

You are about to back up your encrypted private keys to a PDF document.\nThe PDF document can safely be shared using email or with file-sharing apps you have installed, such as Dropbox. This is because your keys are encrypted.

Your Bits of Gold wallet backup is attached.

Follow these simple steps to secure your funds:
1. Print the PDF document.
2. Write the 15-character password from the display of your Android device to the blue boxes of the printout.
3. Verify that you can import the private keys to your Bits of Gold Wallet.
4. Store the printout in a safe place.
This is the random password with checksum used for encrypting this backup.
This is your only opportunity for viewing the password for this backup.\nYour next backup will use a different password.\nWrite it down and keep it safe!
Enter the password that was used when creating the backup in the \"Bitcoin Wallet\" app.
Please enter the message that you want to sign here

Warning. You are about to export the private key that controls all the Bitcoins of this address.

Anyone who gains access to this key can take possession of the Bitcoins it controls.

Do you want to continue?

You are about to export the private key that controls all the Bitcoins of the selected address.

Anyone who gains access to this key can take possession of the Bitcoins it controls.

Do you want to continue?

Warning: Exporting the private key to clipboard exposes it to all other apps on your device.

Note: It is not enough to store your private key on the clipboard, you also have to paste it somewhere safe.

Do you want to continue?
The clipboard contains a private key.\r\nDo you want to delete it?
Error from geocoder: %s \n please try again later.

ALERT

Your device runs Android version 4.1.1 and has a critical bug known as Heartbleed.

This bug allows an attacker to read the memory of any apps on your device that make HTTPS connections.

 You should take immediate action!

1. Move your funds to new addresses where the private key has never been on an Android 4.1.1 device.

2. Upgrade your device to another version than 4.1.1 or use another device.
No barcode scans have been recorded
Could not decrypt the Bitcoin Wallet backup file. Is the password correct?
Could not read the Bitcoin Wallet backup file.
You are about to decrypt a BIP38 password protected private key.
The password entered is not correct.
You are about to decrypt a password protected private key.
Enter the 15 character password and checksum.
The checksum is invalid. Please verify.
Import Private Key from the \"Bitcoin Wallet\" client by Andreas Schildbach.

The private key was already present
This page gives access to advanced Bitcoin key management features for experts in Bitcoin.\n\nYou can enable Expert Mode in Settings.
Your trader account does not exist.
One of your Local Trader ads will soon deactivate.
Your wallet does not have enough funds.\nTo complete this deal you have to add more funds to your wallet.
You can choose another base price
Enter your location or use the cross hair to get an approximation
Because both of you accepted the deal your ratings may get a penalty.\nDo you wish to abort this trade?"
Did you receive %1$s %2$s and are you ready to send the bitcoins to %3$s?
Do you want to delete this sell order?
Do you wish to stop this trade?"
You are using Local Trader for the first time and need to enter a few details.\n\nChoose the Bitcoin address you wish to link to your trader account:
Do you wish to buy or sell bitcoin:
Choose the location where you wish to trade:
Choose the maximum amount to trade:
Choose the minimum amount to trade:
Choose the fiat currency you accept:
Choose the premium you wish to add on top of the base price:

This will detach your Local Trader account from Mycelium and delete locally cached trade data. The next time you use Local Trader you can attach the same address to continue using the same trader identity.\n\nDo you wish to detach from Local Trader?
The name you chose is already taken. Please choose another name
Your wallet needs an upgrade to use this functionality
Your device cannot integrate with Google Play Services, and may not get automatic notifications when trade updates occur.
This feature requires your device to be able to tell its current location. It seems that your device cannot do that. Try enabling location services in your device settings.
Use miles instead of kilometers for distances

This page shows your trade ads.

The list is currently empty.

Click the + button to create one.
This page shows your active trades.\n\nCompleted trades move to the Trade History tab.

There is no Local Trader account associated with this wallet.

A trader account is linked directly to one of your bitcoin addresses, no passwords, no hassle.

Create one now?
The new price depends on the price formula set by the seller and the current market rates.\n\nIf you refresh the price you both have to accept the deal.
On a successful trade your funds will go to the following address:
Please solve this captcha.\nThis is to prevent spam.
Play a notification sound when trade activity occurs
Mycelium Local Trader is a tool that allows buyers and sellers to trade bitcoin for cash. Trading requires buyers and sellers to meet physically as part of the exchange.
Mycelium only acts as a means of communication between two parties, and is not in any way responsible for any actions taken by the trading parties before, during, or after physical meetings.
The Mycelium software guides the trading parties, but they themselves are responsible for exchanging the correct amount of cash and bitcoins and their validity thereof.
Mycelium charges a small 0.2% fee to both sides of any trade. This fee is subject to change in the future.

WELCOME!

Mycelium Local Trader lets you trade cash for bitcoins by finding traders in your local area, without you having to trust an exchange provider with your money. All trades are done directly in person.

Until September 1st, 2014, the fee for trading through the Local Trader system will be 0.2%, which will be added to the total sale price.
You are managing a single archived key.
Bulk mode: barcode scanned and saved

Place a QR-code inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.

The two PIN codes do not match
With aggregated view you operate on all keys and addresses in parallel. With segregated view you operate on one key at a time.
Set preferred Bitcoin denomination. BTC, mBTC, or μBTC
Continuously attempt to autofocus when scanning QR codes
Select the source for obtaining exchange rates between Bitcoin and fiat currencies
Enabling expert mode opens up additional features including advanced key management and multiple wallets
Set a PIN code that restricts access to sending coins, exporting private keys, and changing the PIN code
Communicate through restrictive firewalls or through Tor using Orbot. Enter a host name and port, e.g. \'localhost:9050\'

Improves scanning in low light on some phones, but may cause glare. Does not work on all phones.
Scan for white barcodes on black background. Not available on some devices.
Store multiple scans of the same barcode in History
Try to retrieve more information about the barcode contents
Enhanced with new features and interface

Archived keys do not add to your balance, but you can always select them and monitor them as single keys in the balance view.

Archived keys can be activated again.

Do you want to archive this key?
Create a new random private key.
Warning: Your wallet does not have the private key for this address.\nYou cannot spend coins received unless you have the private key elsewhere.
The password you entered is not valid.\nDo you wish to try again?
Scan Bitcoin address or private key.
Your network connection seems to be slow.\nWith a little patience we might get there…
Tapping the QR code may improve scanning
Upgraded Bitcoin address with private key
Verify private key backup by taking the private key from the clipboard.

Proper private key backup is a cornerstone when managing your Bitcoin funds.\n\nBy verifying your backup you make sure that your backup works and that you do not lose your funds if your Android device is lost or damaged.
Backup ignored for this private key.

It seems that you have one or more Bitcoin private keys that have not been backed up.

Please select the Backup option to back up your keys.

Then click the Verify Backup option and verify your backup.

It seems that you have not backed up your private key.

Please select the Backup option to back up your private key.

Then click the Verify Backup option and verify your backup.

Proper private key backup is a cornerstone when managing your Bitcoin funds.
You have one or more Bitcoin private keys where the backup has not been verified.

Please select the Backup option to back up your keys.
Then select the Verify Backup option and verify your backup.
The private key does not match any of your Bitcoin addresses.
You have %1$s keys that have never been verified.
Private key backup successfully verified for the following address:\n\n%1$s
You have 1 key that has never been verified.
Verify private key backup by scanning the private key QR code.\nSeveral formats are accepted, including the Mycelium encrypted paper backup.
